## License

**License:** <!-- e.g., "MIT", "Apache-2.0" -->

> **Important:** Skills Hub redistributes skill files (including full source content) on its website and
> allows users to download them. Your skill's license **must permit redistribution and derivative works**.
>
> **Recommended licenses:** MIT, Apache-2.0, BSD-2-Clause, BSD-3-Clause, ISC
>
> Skills with restrictive or proprietary licenses (e.g., "All Rights Reserved", licenses that prohibit
> copying/distribution) **cannot be included** in the Hub.
>
> If your skill doesn't have a LICENSE file yet, we recommend adding one. You can use
> [choosealicense.com](https://choosealicense.com/) to pick an appropriate license.

- [ ] My skill includes a `LICENSE` or `LICENSE.txt` file in its folder
- [ ] The license permits redistribution and derivative works
